After talking with @linuspahl, he chose queryByText because

I had to use queryByText  because getByText  would throw “Unable to find an element with the text:”

After looking into queryBy and getBy it appears to me we should be using queryBy in these other tests as well since getBy will never return null, so the test will always succeed in not.toBeNull()
